content-unit-test.description: If the <xccdf:TestResult> is the root XCCDF element, then it will include an <xccdf:benchmark> element [XCCDF:6.6.2]. The <xccdf:benchmark> element MUST have an @href attribute specified. The @href attribute SHALL hold the URI to the XCCDF component (either local to the data stream collection or remote) that was processed. The URI MUST be in the form specified for the @href attribute in Table 8 This updates the href to an external reference and should pass
